Text: On May 28, 2016, a three-year-old boy climbed into a gorilla enclosure at the Cincinnati Zoo and Botanical Garden and was grabbed and dragged by Harambe, a 17-year-old Western lowland gorilla.

<Text: Killing of Harambe:  The incident was recorded on video and received broad international coverage and commentary, including controversy over the choice to kill Harambe.>
